author: akarasulu
msg: Enabled automatic firstime creation of suffix entries for a backend.  If
the entry exists in the backend at initialization time the entry is not
created.  If it does not exist it is created using the suffix entry
attributes in the backend's configuration in the config.xml file.
Config.xml files must be altered to support this new format all the server
will not start complaining on initialization that there is no dn attribute
for the suffix entry definition section.  A good example of such a section
can be found in the backend0 section of the berkeley db backend config.xml.

author: akarasulu
msg: Altered config to support the new suffix creation code in ldapd-server.

author: akarasulu
msg: Forgot to add the backend as a namingcontext in the RootDSE of the nexus

author: akarasulu
msg: Some more cleanups to clearly show that one and subtree level searches
with a base of "" are naming violations as opposed to the root dse search
